unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Smart Musicians: What is the Probability?
question_text:
At a large high school, $31\%$ of students are involved in the school's music program (band, orchestra, choir, etc.). At this same school, $19\%$ of students are involved in the music program and are on the honor roll.
If a student is selected at random from among those who participate in the school's music program, what is the probability the selected student will be on the honor roll?
